interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Delux Premium Blackhead & Blemish Remover Kit - Acne Treatment - 6 Professional Surgical Extractor Instruments - Extra Lancet - Cure Pimples, Blackheads, Comedones, Facial Impurities-Macs-2010 Review Date: 2016/06/12 Store: Mac Professional Product Description: ["Macs Delux Blackhead & ; Blemish Remover Kit The #1 Dermatologist Approved Blackhead Remover Kit Stop Trying to Press or Pop them Yourself! You Won't Find a Better and Safer Solution for Perfect Skin Features:- - Ideal for Removal of all types of Blackheads, Cone domes and Facial Impurities - 6 Unique Remover Tools With in One kit that Dermatologists across the country use. - Easy to Use and Designed for Optimal Balance, Comfort and Performance for Your Skin! Will not cause irritation or redness. Everyone knows that when you try popping facial blemishes yourself it can be very painful and lead to ugly scars. That is the last thing anyone wants.Use The Tools in this Kit to Easily Clean Your Precious Skin. For Real Customer Service We believe our products are the absolute best we can offer to our customers. If for any reason at all, you are not fully satisfied with your essential Blackhead Kit, just simply return it for a full refund or exchange. Simple as that! Treat Your Skin the Way it Should Be with This Beauty Kit and Click ADD TO CART Above! **SPECIAL PROMOTIONAL OFFER** BUY NOW AND GET 60 DAYS REPLACEMENT WARRANTY !"] Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mac Professional', 'Item Form': 'Needle', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Number of Items': '7', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.8 x 2.7 x 1.3 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MACS-2010', 'Manufacturer': 'Macs Products'} Review Text: Its one of the grossest things in the world, blackheads. But lets face it, some of us women are so fascinated by them! We love to pop and pull and squeeze and get all the gunk out of not only our faces, but our spouses. Eeeewww. Until not long ago I did not realize how much popping pimples is so bad for your skin! Leaves holes and scarring and no wonder I have such big pores... So after learning that I was so excited to try out this Deluxe Premium Blackhead & Blemish Remover Kit by Mac Professional. This set comes with so many different tools its hard to know where to start. There is one tool in particular that is the coolest, though a bit dangerous. It has two heads that screw into each side for safety and can be removed and screwed on the sides, and has a lancet and another head. Its extremely sharp and you must be careful with it, this is a "professional" set so I really don't use more than the ones just to remove blackheads, very nice set, and I love that it comes with a case that has inserts to safely store every piece. I received this product at a discounted rate

Thanks <3 Review Title: Be careful with these tools if you dont know how to use them. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests**: Strongly focused on skincare, particularly in treating blackheads and facial blemishes. Appreciates tools that are professional-grade and designed for effective skin treatment.
- **Preferences**: Favors high-quality, multifunctional skincare kits that offer a variety of tools for different needs. Values safety and efficient design in beauty tools, showing a preference for sets that prioritize ease of use and skin protection.
- **Behavior Patterns**: Engages in detailed and thorough product analysis before and after purchase, indicating a preference for comprehensive reviews and information. Utilizes skincare treatments with a cautious approach, emphasizing the importance of using tools carefully to avoid skin damage.
- **Attitude Towards Popping Blemishes**: Expresses both a fascination with the process and an understanding of its potential harm, reflecting a balance between curiosity and caution.

Overall, this user displays a proactive interest in maintaining clear skin while navigating the risks involved with blemish removal. They are likely to continue exploring professional skincare solutions that offer effective results while ensuring safety and care in usage.
